divs: sighting detailsmay 14, 2013 @ about 10pm. i saw a red light moving erratically behind trees on ft carson by gate 19\ i25 exit 128 from east of i25 in fountain. there were also two helicopters circling just north of the area after the light disappeared. i only saw it for a second, before it went dark
